Title: Ajax TreeView
Description: A piece of ASP.NET code to generate an AJAX powered XHTML TreeView control. That is a progressively loading tree capable of handling HUGE structures.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An ASP.NET AJAX XHTML TreeView solution

This Ajax component will render a UL-LI listing progressively. When you click a node it will query a webservice for the nodes to insert and dynamically expand without reloading your page or bloat your viewstate.
Since it is pure XHTML you can style it heavily with straight forward CSS.
